name: Spirit of Fire
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.

name: Spirit of Water
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.

name: Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.

name: Lorraine, Wandering Warrior
effect: On Enter: Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.
effect_raw: On Enter: Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.

rule.description: You still need to pay the costs of the weapon. Most of the time, this cost will be 0. However, if an effect modifies the cost of the card, this cost must be paid. In addition, if the selected card has an additional cost of materialization, that cost must also be paid.

flavor: “This beautiful world we have been tasked to save... It carries such a stench of smoke and ash.”

name: Lorraine, Blademaster
effect: Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.) On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."
effect_raw:
Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)
On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 power and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

rule.description: With the On Enter effect, Lorraine's attacks get the additional effects, not Lorraine herself. This means that Lorraine still needs a weapon or attack card in order to declare attacks because she does not have an attack stat.

flavor: "Let me show you true swordistry."

editions.effect: Lorraine Lineage On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."
editions.flavor: "Let my blade grant you peace."

editions.effect: Lorraine Lineage On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

name: Lorraine, Crux Knight
effect: Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Crux Knight must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.) Lorraine's attacks get +1 for each regalia weapon card in your banishment.
effect_raw:
Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Crux Knight must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)
Lorraine's attacks get +1 power for each regalia weapon card in your banishment.

rule.description: With Lorraine's static effect, her attacks get the additional effects, not Lorraine herself. This means that Lorraine still needs a weapon or attack card in order to declare attacks because she does not have an attack stat.

flavor: "Majestic Spirit, hear my call!"

result_editions.effect: Lorraine Lineage Lorraine's attacks get +1 for each regalia weapon card in your banishment.

editions.effect: Lorraine Lineage Lorraine's attacks get +1 for each regalia weapon card in your banishment.
editions.flavor: "Majestic Spirit, hear my call!"

editions.effect: Lorraine Lineage Lorraine's attacks get +1 for each regalia weapon card in your banishment.

name: Rai, Spellcrafter
effect: On Enter: Put two enlighten counters on Rai. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw: On Enter: Put two enlighten counters on Rai. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
flavor: "Mana runs richly through this world's leylines. I will make use of its abundance."

editions.effect: On Enter: Put two enlighten counters on Rai.

name: Rai, Archmage
effect: Rai Lineage (Rai, Archmage must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.) Inherited Effect: Whenever you activate your first Mage action card each turn, put an enlighten counter on your champion. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)
effect_raw:
Rai Lineage (Rai, Archmage must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.)
Inherited Effect: Whenever you activate your first Mage action card each turn, put an enlighten counter on your champion. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

editions.effect: Rai Lineage Inherited Effect: Whenever you activate your first Mage action card each turn, put an enlighten counter on your champion.

name: Rai, Storm Seer
effect: Rai Lineage (Rai, Storm Seer must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.) Rai gets +1 level for each arcane element Mage Spell card in your banishment.
effect_raw:
Rai Lineage (Rai, Storm Seer must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.)
Rai gets +1 level for each arcane element Mage Spell card in your banishment.
flavor: "Ready yourself, otherwise it won't be a fair fight."

result_editions.effect: Rai Lineage Rai gets +1 level for each arcane element Mage Spell card in your banishment.

editions.effect: Rai Lineage Rai gets +1 level for each arcane element Mage Spell card in your banishment.
editions.flavor: "Ready yourself, otherwise it won't be a fair fight."

editions.effect: Rai Lineage Rai gets +1 level for each arcane element Mage Spell card in your banishment.

name: Silvie, Wilds Whisperer
effect: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
effect_raw: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: "Hey, look! Aren't my new friends cute?"

editions.effect: On Enter: The next Animal or Beast ally card you activate this turn enters the field with an additional buff counter on it.

name: Silvie, With the Pack
effect: Silvie Lineage (Silvie, With the Pack must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.) On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Silvie Lineage (Silvie, With the Pack must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.)
On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.

rule.description: If you control both an Animal and a Beast during the resolution of the On Enter effect, you will draw two cards.

flavor: "Let's see if we can find your family!"

editions.effect: Silvie Lineage On Enter: If you control an Animal ally, draw a card. If you control a Beast ally, draw a card.

name: Silvie, Loved by All
effect: Silvie Lineage (Silvie, Loved by All must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.) Animal and Beast allies you control get +1 and have intercept.
effect_raw:
Silvie Lineage (Silvie, Loved by All must be leveled from a previous level "Silvie" champion.)
Animal and Beast allies you control get +1 life and have intercept.
flavor: "I'm so happy I met you all!"

result_editions.effect: Silvie Lineage Animal and Beast allies you control get +1 and have intercept.

editions.effect: Silvie Lineage Animal and Beast allies you control get +1 and have intercept.

name: Zander, Blinding Steel
effect: Zander Lineage (Zander, Blinding Steel must be leveled from a previous level "Zander" champion.) At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may reveal all cards in your memory. For each luxem element card revealed, each opponent puts a card from their hand into their memory.
effect_raw:
Zander Lineage (Zander, Blinding Steel must be leveled from a previous level "Zander" champion.)
At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may reveal all cards in your memory. For each luxem element card revealed, each opponent puts a card from their hand into their memory.

editions.effect: Zander Lineage At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may reveal all cards in your memory. For each luxem element card revealed, each opponent puts a card from their hand into their memory.
editions.flavor: [NULL]

name: Bauble of Abundance
effect: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.

name: Beastbond Boots
effect: Banish Beastbond Paws: Your champion gains spellshroud until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control an Animal or Beast ally. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Paws: Your champion gains spellshroud until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control an Animal or Beast ally. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)

rule.description: The condition of needing to control an Animal or Beast ally is only checked upon activating the ability of Beastbond Boots.

flavor: A tamer's bond with their beast goes beyond simple empathy.

name: Beastbond Ears
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
effect_raw: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
flavor: The easiest way to gain a beast's favor is to first look like them.

name: Beastbond Paws
effect: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
effect_raw: Banish Beastbond Paws: Target Animal or Beast ally you control gets +1 power and gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
flavor: A beast's ferocity and a tamer's guidance make for a formidable combination.

name: Clarent, Sword of Peace
effect: Class BonusRemove a durability counter from Clarent: Prevent the next 1 non-attack damage that would be dealt to each unit you control this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Remove a durability counter from Clarent: Prevent the next 1 non-attack damage that would be dealt to each unit you control this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: You may use Clarent's ability multiple times to effectively prevent more damage.
The damage prevention effect of Clarent is tracked individually for each unit affected.

flavor: To protect its owner, it would sacrifice itself.

name: Crystal of Empowerment
effect: Banish Crystal of Empowerment: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
effect_raw: Banish Crystal of Empowerment: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
flavor: Mages often store their excess mana into such crystals. If used by even a novice mage, one might mistake them for far greater.

name: Endura, Scepter of Ignition
effect: , Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
effect_raw: REST, Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
flavor: Its spark glows vibrantly in otherworldly color. Some say the staff has an ominous origin, perhaps from a far more sinister world.

name: Fire Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
flavor: Captured, perhaps, but never tamed. This spirit's owner must always err on the side of caution.

name: Flute of Taming
effect: : Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn. : Target Animal or Beast ally gets your choice of +1 or +1 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
REST: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.
REST: Target Animal or Beast ally gets your choice of +1 power or +1 life until end of turn.
flavor: Simple yet versatile, a flute has many uses for one who has mastered it.

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa

name: Mana Limiter
effect: You can't remove enlighten counters from your champion to pay for costs. Banish Mana Limiter: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has six or more enlighten counters on them.
effect_raw:
You can't remove enlighten counters from your champion to pay for costs. 
Banish Mana Limiter: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has six or more enlighten counters on them.

rule.description: Mana Limiter's static ability prevents you from using three enlighten counters to draw, in addition to any other effects that require you to remove enlighten counters as a cost.

name: Melodious Flute
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally. Class BonusBanish Melodious Flute: The next Harmony action card you activate this turn is a Melody in addition to its other types.
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.
[Class Bonus] Banish Melodious Flute: The next Harmony action card you activate this turn is a Melody in addition to its other types.

name: Orb of Choking Fumes
effect: Banish Orb of Choking Fumes: Cards your opponents activate this turn costs 1 more to activate. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Banish Orb of Choking Fumes: Cards your opponents activate this turn costs 1 more to activate. Class Bonus: Draw a card. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: The cost increase only affects cards that are activated, not materialized.

The type of cost increased is based on the card's default cost type. In most cases, it will increase reserve cost because it only affects activation costs. However, if a card can be activated from the material deck and has a memory cost as its default cost, the memory cost will increase by 1.

flavor: Warning: May cause intractable coughing.

name: Ornamental Greatsword
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: An ornate and pristine sword used ceremoniously with great effect, though dull of edge.

name: Surveillance Stone
effect: Whenever an opponent declares an attack with a unit for the third time each turn, you may banish Surveillance Stone. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an opponent declares an attack with a unit for the third time each turn, you may banish Surveillance Stone. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: A simple tool that offers peace of mind and, with it, a good night's sleep.

name: Sword of Seeking
effect: Class BonusTrue Sight (Attacks using this weapon can target units with stealth. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] True Sight (Attacks using this weapon can target units with stealth. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Before this blade, nothing remains hidden.

name: Tome of Knowledge
effect: Class BonusYour champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Banish Tome of Knowledge: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Banish Tome of Knowledge: Draw a card.

name: Warrior's Longsword
effect: Class BonusWarrior's Longsword gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Warrior's Longsword gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A dependable sword made of sturdy steel with an edge honed enough to pierce most defenses. A warrior's true companion.

name: Water Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Water Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Water Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.
flavor: Torrents crash and turn along the edges of this orb, waiting for their inevitable release.

name: Wind Resonance Bauble
effect: Banish Wind Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Wind Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.
flavor: A spirit of wind sleeps within this bauble. Perhaps it will grant blessings once it wakes.

name: Arcanist's Prism
effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order, then draw that many cards.
effect_raw: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order, then draw that many cards.
flavor:
"Such a curious thing. It seems as though it's alive."
— Rai Kyouki

name: Prismatic Edge
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Each player reveals all cards in their memory. If a fire element card was revealed, choose a unit and deal 3 damage to it. If a water element card was revealed, draw a card. If a wind element card was revealed, each opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Each player reveals all cards in their memory. If a fire element card was revealed, choose a unit and deal 3 damage to it. If a water element card was revealed, draw a card. If a wind element card was revealed, each opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.

rule.description: For each element, the resulting effect is only performed once regardless of how many of that element is revealed. E.g. If five fire cards were revealed, you only get to deal 3 damage to one unit once.

name: Caliburn of Silencing
effect: Class BonusOn Champion Hit: The hit champion loses all abilities until the beginning of your next turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: The hit champion loses all abilities until the beginning of your next turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: A champion hit by Caliburn of Silencing has cards in its lineage lose their abilities temporarily, as well.
On Hit only triggers when 1 or more damage is dealt from the source. If all of the damage was prevented, then On Hit will not trigger.

flavor: Enchanted by binding magic, this weapon can disable most powers.

name: Seed of Nature
effect: Seed of Nature enters the field rested. On Enter: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn. Class Bonus, Banish Crystal of Nature: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Seed of Nature enters the field rested.
On Enter: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
[Class Bonus] REST, Banish Crystal of Nature: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.

name: Banner Knight
effect: Class BonusLevel 2+Other allies and weapons you control get +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
flavor: Standards raised behind capable leaders often instill courage in those that march astride.

editions.effect: Class BonusLevel 2+Other allies and weapons you control get +1.
editions.flavor: Their passion and fervor on the battlefield inspire fellow warriors to ascend in strength.

name: Barrier Servant
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) Remove two enlighten counters from your champion: The next time damage would be dealt to Barrier Servant this turn, prevent that damage.
effect_raw:
Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)
Remove two enlighten counters from your champion: The next time damage would be dealt to Barrier Servant this turn, prevent that damage.

editions.effect: Intercept Remove two enlighten counters from your champion: The next time damage would be dealt to Barrier Servant this turn, prevent that damage.
editions.flavor: An unbreakable ward for those enlightened.

name: Blissful Calling
effect: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an Animal or Beast card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
effect_raw: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an Animal or Beast card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor: Sincere tunes can draw in even the wariest of beasts.

name: Careful Study
effect: Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.) Put five enlighten counters on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw:
Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.)
Put five enlighten counters on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)

name: Crusader of Aesa
effect: Crusader of Aesa enters the field rested. Class BonusIntercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Crusader of Aesa enters the field rested.
[Class Bonus] Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Deflecting Edge
effect:
This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.
Prevent the next 3 attack damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
effect_raw:
This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.
Prevent the next 3 attack damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.

rule.description: Deflecting Edge can only prevent attack damage, which is damage dealt by attacks.
The damage prevented does not need to be from one source. E.g. three different sources each dealing 1 attack damage each can all be prevented in the same turn.

flavor: When masterfully used, a sword can deflect any attack with minimal force.

name: Empowering Harmony
effect: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn. Class BonusHarmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.
[Class Bonus] Harmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, draw a card.
flavor: Melodies sound ever more beautiful with strong accompaniment.

editions.flavor: "Next time, it'll be my concert!"

name: Esteemed Knight
effect: Class BonusIntercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A knight whose reputation precedes them. They raise their sword for noble purpose.

editions.effect: Class BonusIntercept
editions.flavor: Fearsome in battle and resolute in defense, these knights serve faithfully as Camelot's elite bastion.

name: Gray Wolf
effect: Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.)
effect_raw: Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.)

rule.description: A unit that does not obey you can't attack or intercept, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

flavor: A common predator that roams the temperate woodlands of Aesa. One would do well to not adventure there alone.

editions.effect: Pride 2 (He won't listen to me unless im level 2!)
editions.flavor:
"Sometimes I drop my flute, but this one picks it up!"
—Silvie Heartsong

name: Honorable Vanguard
effect: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: “Advance! Keep them away from the gates until reinforcements arrive!”

editions.flavor: Important duties among front-line soldiers include the occasional instruction of trainees at the academy.

name: Idle Thoughts
effect: Look at the top four cards of your deck and then put them back in any order. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Look at the top four cards of your deck and then put them back in any order.
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Inspiring Call
effect: This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn. Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw:
This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn.
Allies you control get +1 power until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.
flavor:
"Aesans, rally to me! Camelot will not fall!" 
— Lorraine Allard

name: Library Witch
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) On Death: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)
On Death: Draw a card.
flavor: The librarians of mage academies instill their love for reading in aspiring students.

editions.effect: Intercept On Death: Draw a card.
editions.flavor: Talented yet secretive, imperial mages only double as personal instructors for the pinnacle of Cambrian royalty and nobility.

name: Magus Disciple
effect: Your champion gets +1 level. Class BonusOn Death: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +1 level.
[Class Bonus] On Death: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: "Harness mana and divert it to the archmage!"

name: Opening Cut
effect: Class BonusAs long as you have exactly one card in your memory, Opening Cut gets +2￰. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] As long as you have exactly one card in your memory, Opening Cut gets +2 power￰. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Fair fights only exist within honorable duels. In true battle, the quickest to act is usually the victor.

name: Peer into Mana
effect: Put 2+LV enlighten counters on your champion. (LV refers to your champion's level. You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw: Put 2+LV enlighten counters on your champion. (LV refers to your champion's level. You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
flavor: Few have such innate talent to probe pure mana. Fewer still can exquisitely mold it.

name: Rebellious Bull
effect: Rebellious Bull enters the field rested. Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)
effect_raw:
Rebellious Bull enters the field rested.
Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)

rule.description: A unit that does not obey you can't attack or intercept, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

flavor: Though strong and resilient, these prideful beasts are difficult to make submit.

name: Savage Slash
effect: Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Her first strike was ferocious.

name: Scry the Skies
effect: Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw: Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: The skies hold secrets only privy to the few versed in its signs.

name: Smack with Flute
effect: On Attack: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn. Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
On Attack: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn. 
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Song of Nurturing
effect: Allies you control get +2 until end of turn. Class Bonus: Those allies also get +1 until end of turn. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Allies you control get +2 life until end of turn. Class Bonus: Those allies also get +1 power until end of turn. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Mana-imbued music invigorates those who hear it.

name: Sudden Steel
effect: Class BonusEfficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Her last strike was deadly.

name: Training Session
effect: Put a buff counter on target ally you control. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
effect_raw: Put a buff counter on target ally you control. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: With enough practice, even a shabby recruit can turn into a capable fighter.

name: Trusty Steed
effect: On Enter: Another target ally you control gets +2 until end of turn.
effect_raw: On Enter: Another target ally you control gets +2 power until end of turn.
flavor: Bonded and trained, these majestic creatures offer warriors powerful advantages in battle.

editions.effect: On Enter: Another target ally you control gets +2 until end of turn.
editions.flavor:
"This is a very good and helpful pony!"
—Silvie Heartsong

name: Veteran Soldier
effect: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: The recent strife and turmoil within Aesa has hardened even the greenest of recruits.

editions.effect: Floating Memory
editions.flavor: I will carve out my legacy into Aesan soil with steel. Let this bloodshed sate this endless hunger for war.

name: Weaponsmith
effect: Class BonusAt the beginning of your recollection phase, put a durability counter on target weapon you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a durability counter on target weapon you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: The forges burn bright as war dawns on Cambria.

name: Blitz Mage
flavor: Some mage circles will lend specialized troops excelling in both swiftness and destructive capability.

editions.effect: [NULL]
editions.flavor: Need a castle leveled? Just say the word.

name: Creative Shock
effect: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Class Bonus: If a fire element card was discarded, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Class Bonus: If a fire element card was discarded, you may choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: Once Creative Shock starts to resolve, players can't respond to its effects. If a player wants to respond to the potential 2 damage Creative Shock can deal, it must be responded to before Creative Shock starts resolving (before its controller draws two cards).

flavor: Varuck holds many fiery insights.

name: Cremation Ritual
effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally.
Draw two cards.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally you control.
Draw two cards.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally you control.' -> 'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally.

flavor: Embellished by flames, the former warrior's mighty countenance bred conviction in their compatriots.

name: Disintegrate
effect: Class BonusEfficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Destroy target ally or regalia.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Destroy target ally or regalia.

name: Fireball
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Deal 1+LV damage to target unit. (LV refers to your champion's level.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Deal 1+LV damage to target unit. (LV refers to your champion's level.)

editions.effect: Class BonusThis card costs 2 less to activate. Deal 1+LV damage to target unit.
editions.flavor: It doesn't matter how fast or how far you run. I'll just burn down the entire forest as well.

name: Flame-Rune Swordsman
effect: Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: A mage's prowess. A warrior's might.

name: Focused Flames
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Deal 4 damage to target ally.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Deal 4 damage to target ally.

name: Ignite the Soul
effect: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Deal 1 damage to target unit.
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Impassioned Tutor
effect: On Attack: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.
effect_raw: On Attack: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.
flavor: "Let me show you how it's done!"

name: Purge in Flames
effect: Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.) Deal 2 damage to all units except for your champion. Class Bonus: Deal 3 damage to those units instead. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.)
Deal 2 damage to all units except for your champion. Class Bonus: Deal 3 damage to those units instead. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Blue Slime
effect: Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.) Class BonusWhenever Blue Slime is dealt damage, put a buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)
effect_raw:
Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.)
[Class Bonus] Whenever Blue Slime is dealt damage, put a buff counter on it. (Allies get +1 power and +1 life for each buff counter on them.)

rule.description: A unit that does not obey you can't attack or intercept, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

name: Deep Sea Beastbonder
effect: Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally. Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally. 
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Dewdrop Hares
effect: Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A rare sight after fresh rain.

name: Freezing Hail
effect: Deal 2 damage to target unit. That unit doesn't wake up during its controller's next wake up phase.
effect_raw: Deal 2 damage to target unit. That unit doesn't wake up during its controller's next wake up phase.
flavor: Sharpened shards carrying a piercing chill freeze almost everything to the core."

editions.effect: Deal 2 damage to target unit. That unit doesn't wake up during its controller's next wake up phase.
editions.flavor: Conjured ice cold enough to chill to the bone. Or sharp enough to pierce the heart.

name: Giant Tortoise
flavor: Majestic and ancient, these Cambrian tortoises have lived longer than most of the kingdoms that have risen and fallen. They are docile, friendly to all without maligned intention, and often help other creatures in need. Strong of spirit and pure of heart, these creatures inspire only awe.

editions.flavor:
“Shelly very boring. I don’t play with him much.”
—Silvie Heartsong

name: Give Bath
effect: Remove all temporary damage from target ally. Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Remove all temporary damage from target ally.
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor:
“Washy washy! Clean doggy!”
— Silvie Heartsong

name: Lakeside Serpent
effect: Pride 6 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 6 or higher.) Class BonusLakeside Serpent gets +1 for each water element card in your graveyard. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Pride 6 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 6 or higher.)
[Class Bonus] Lakeside Serpent gets +1 power for each water element card in your graveyard. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: A unit that does not obey you can't attack or intercept, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

name: Mist Resonance
effect: Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Class BonusHarmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, allies you control assign damage with their life stat instead of power stat until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Allies you control get +1 life until end of turn.
[Class Bonus] Harmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, allies you control assign damage with their life stat instead of power stat until end of turn.

name: Piper's Lullaby
effect: If you control an Animal or Beast ally, your champion gets +1 level until end of turn. Class BonusRest up to one target ally. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
If you control an Animal or Beast ally, your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.
[Class Bonus] Rest up to one target ally. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Music that soothes beast and man alike.

name: Revitalizing Cleanse
effect: Reveal all cards in your memory. Recover X where X is the amount of water element cards revealed this way. Draw a card. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
effect_raw: Reveal all cards in your memory. Recover X where X is the amount of water element cards revealed this way. Draw a card. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
flavor: A healing prayer for the pure of soul.

name: Favorable Winds
effect: Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Allies you control get +1 life until end of turn.
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: A sudden gust to turn the tide.

editions.effect: Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Floating Memory
editions.flavor: "Woh. Got swept up in traveling!"

name: Hurricane Sweep
effect: Class BonusEfficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Cleave (Attack all units a chosen opponent controls. This attack can't be intercepted.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Cleave (Attack all units a chosen opponent controls. This attack can't be intercepted.)

rule.description: During the retaliation step, all units being attacked can retaliate if able.

editions.effect: Class BonusEfficiency Cleave
editions.flavor: Forged in battle and honed under pressure, Lorraine's unsheathed blade tore through the enemy's front, scattering unfortunate fodder to the winds.

name: Phalanx Captain
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate for each Human ally you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Other Human allies you control get +1 as long as they're attacking.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate for each Human ally you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Other Human allies you control get +1 power as long as they're attacking.

name: Reclaim
effect: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Return target ally you control to its owner's hand.
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: A summoning circle at the ready for a quick escape.

editions.effect: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand. Floating Memory
editions.flavor: Magical ingenuity turned into battlefield tactics.

name: Swift Recruit
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

editions.effect: Intercept Floating Memory
editions.flavor: "Dodge. Parry. Strike. Rehearse these movements. One false step on the battlefield is all it will take.

name: Wind Cutter
effect: Class BonusWind Cutter gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) On Hit: Reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, put Wind Cutter into your memory.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Wind Cutter gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
On Hit: Reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, put Wind Cutter into your memory.

rule.description: On Hit only triggers when 1 or more damage is dealt from the source. If all of the damage was prevented, then On Hit will not trigger.

name: Anger the Skies
effect: Deal 3 damage to all allies. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those allies instead.
effect_raw: Deal 3 damage to all allies. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those allies instead.
flavor: Those beneath darkened clouds can do little once the raucous thundering begins.

name: Arcane Blast
effect: Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.) Deal 11 damage to target champion.
effect_raw:
Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.)
Deal 11 damage to target champion.
flavor: Power enough to level entire fortifications, only an arm's length away.

editions.effect: Efficiency Deal 11 damage to target champion.
editions.flavor: Never question a devoted practitioner of the arcane arts. You will only get one answer back.

name: Arcane Disposition
effect: Draw two cards. At the beginning of the next end phase, discard your hand. Class Bonus:Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Draw two cards. At the beginning of the next end phase, discard your hand.
[Class Bonus:] Draw a card.
flavor: Controlling such chaotic mana requires great finesse and some degree of luck.

name: Arcane Sight
effect:
Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.
Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"If only you could see what I see, Lorraine. Even you might abandon the sword."
— Rai Kyouki

name: Power Overwhelming
effect: Remove any amount of enlighten counters from your champion. Your champion gets +1 level for each counter removed this way until end of turn.
effect_raw: Remove any amount of enlighten counters from your champion. Your champion gets +1 level for each counter removed this way until end of turn.
flavor: Power without semblance of subtlety. One would do well to discard notions of escaping unscathed when battling a full-fledged arcanist.

name: Spellshield: Arcane
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. The next time damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent that damage. Put an amount of enlighten counters on your champion equal to the amount of damage prevented this way.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.
The next time damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent that damage. Put an amount of enlighten counters on your champion equal to the amount of damage prevented this way.

rule.description: If unpreventable damage is dealt under Spellshield: Arcane's effect, the damage prevented is zero and no enlighten counters will be generated.

name: Crux Sight
effect:
You may pay an additional 2 as you activate this card. If you do, banish this card as it resolves, then return a crux element card from your graveyard to your hand. 
Draw a card.
effect_raw:
You may pay an additional 2 as you activate this card. If you do, banish this card as it resolves, then return a crux element card from your graveyard to your hand. 
Draw a card.

rule.description: To pay an additional 2 means to pay an additional 2 of the card's default cost type, which is reserve.
If Crux Sight does not resolve, then it does not get banished due to its effect and you will not be able to return a crux element card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Spirit Blade: Ascension
effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, return a Sword regalia you own to your material deck.
Choose a Sword regalia card from your material deck or banishment and put it onto the field.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, return a Sword regalia you own to your material deck.
Choose a Sword regalia card from your material deck or banishment and put it onto the field.
flavor: With the spirits' aid, even a worn sword may be transfigured into a divine relic.

name: Spirit Blade: Dispersion
effect: Remove all durability counters from any amount of Sword weapons you control, then banish them. Choose any amount of units and deal damage equal to the amount of durability counters removed this way split among them.
effect_raw: Remove all durability counters from any amount of Sword weapons you control, then banish them. Choose any amount of units and deal damage equal to the amount of durability counters removed this way split among them.

rule.description: You may not choose how many durability counters are removed from each weapon. All durability counters are removed from each weapon you select.

flavor: When spirits take, they pay in kind.

name: Spirit Blade: Ghost Strike
effect: On Attack: You may banish a card from your material deck. If you do, your champion's attacks get +1 until end of turn.
effect_raw: On Attack: You may banish a card from your material deck. If you do, your champion's attacks get +1 power until end of turn.

rule.description: Attack cards resolve as damage is dealt. This means if you paid for the Spectral Shift cost, you would banish this card On Hit, and return a crux element card to your hand.

name: Spirit Blade: Infusion
effect: This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has dealt attack damage this turn. Until end of turn, target Sword weapon gets +3 and "On Champion Hit: Draw a card."
effect_raw:
This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has dealt attack damage this turn.
Until end of turn, target Sword weapon gets +3 power and "On Champion Hit: Draw a card."

rule.description: On Hit only triggers when 1 or more damage is dealt from the source. If all of the damage was prevented, then On Hit will not trigger.

flavor: A blade empowered with spiritual might.

name: Spirit's Blessing
effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, return a regalia you control to its owner's material deck.
Wake up your champion. Draw a card.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, return a regalia you control to its owner's material deck.
Wake up your champion. Draw a card.
flavor: Spirits bestow their favor upon those who offer tribute in earnest.

name: Gaia's Songbird
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Beast ally card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in a random order. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Beast ally card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in a random order. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Invoke Dominance
effect: Preserve (Put this card into your material deck preserved as it resolves. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.) Your champion gets +3 level until end of turn. You can't activate non-ally cards this turn.
effect_raw:
Preserve (Put this card into your material deck preserved as it resolves. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.)
Your champion gets +3 level until end of turn. You can't activate non-ally cards this turn.

name: Meadowbloom Dryad
effect: Preserve (When this ally dies, put it into your material deck preserved. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.) Class BonusWhenever Meadowbloom Dryad or another ally enters the field under your control, put a buff counter on target ally.
effect_raw:
Preserve (When this ally dies, put it into your material deck preserved. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.)
[Class Bonus] Whenever Meadowbloom Dryad or another ally enters the field under your control, put a buff counter on target ally.

name: Tera Sight
effect: Preserve (Put this card into your material deck preserved as it resolves. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.) Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Preserve (Put this card into your material deck preserved as it resolves. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.)
Draw a card.
flavor: See the heartbeat of life.

name: Vertus, Gaia's Roar
effect: Pride 10 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 10 or higher.) Class BonusOn Enter: Allies you control get +1 for each Animal and/or Beast ally card in your graveyard until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Pride 10 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 10 or higher.)
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Allies you control get +1 power for each Animal and/or Beast ally card in your graveyard until end of turn.

rule.description: A unit that does not obey you can't attack or intercept, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

flavor: All cower quickly before his might.
